original_title: Sri Lanka raises petrol to Rs328 a litre, diesel Rs346 from July 01
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT –  Sri Lanka state run Ceylon Petroleum Corporation has raised the price of 92 Octane petrol by 10 rupees to 328 rupees, effective from June 30 mid night.
Petrol Octane 95 was reduced by 20 rupees to 365 rupees a litre.
Super Diesel was increased by 6 rupees to 346 rupees per litre, and Auto Diesel was reduced by 2 rupees to 308 rupees.
Kerosene was reduced by 9 rupees to 236 rupees. (Colombo/ July 01/2023)
